decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission. Reason: To comply with the provisions of S.51 of the Planning & Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:Site Location Plan;Block Plan;Existing Site Ground Floor Plan 24.03.2025; Existing Ground Floor Plan 24.03.2025;Existing First Floor Plan 24.03.2025;Existing Lower Roof Plan 24.03.2025;Existing Upper Roof Plan 24.03.2025;Existing Street Front South West Elevation 24.03.2025;Existing Front South West Elevation 24.03.2025;Existing Rear North East Elevation 24.03.2025;Existing Site Side North West Elevation 24.03.2025;Existing Side North West Elevation 24.03.2025;Existing Side South East Elevation 24.03.2025;Existing Section A 24.03.2025;Proposed Site Ground Floor Plan 24.03.2025;Proposed Ground Floor Plan 24.03.2025;Proposed First Floor Plan 24.03.2025;Proposed Lower Roof Plan 24.03.2025;Proposed Upper Roof Plan 24.03.2025;Proposed Street Front South West Elevation 24.03.2025;Proposed Front South West Elevation 24.03.2025;Proposed Rear North East Elevation 24.03.2025;Proposed Site Side North West Elevation 24.03.2025;Proposed Side North West Elevation 24.03.2025;Proposed Side South East Elevation 24.03.2025;Proposed Section A 24.03.2025;Heritage Statement ref: N147JU 24.03.2025;Planning Statement ref: N147JU 24.03.2025.Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved and Condition 2 above, no permission is granted for the retention of the existing concrete wall infilling the garage opening, which shall be removed to allow the garage door to be set back from the front elevation. No construction works shall take place until details, including amended elevation and section drawings of the garage doorway (at a scale of 1:1 to 1:20), showing the joint between the garage doorway and the flanking pilasters, have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the undesignated heritage asset and to preserve the character and appearance of the surrounding conservation area.
description: Works to the front fa√ßade to reinstate the garage door.
